Package persistance

Interface UserDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserDDBBDAO
public interface UserDAO
Interface used for accessing the users

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean addUser​(User user, java.lang.String password)
    Adds a registered user to the database
    boolean addVirtualUser​(java.lang.String nick)
    Adds a virtual user to the database
    boolean deleteUser​(User user, java.lang.String password)
    Deletes a user from the database if the password matches
    java.lang.Boolean existsUser​(java.lang.String nick)
    Checks if a user (real or virtual) exists in the database
    java.lang.Boolean existsVirtualUser​(java.lang.String nick)
    Checks if a virtual user exists
    User getUser​(java.lang.String nick, java.lang.String password)
    Returns a user in the database if the username and password matches

  • Method Details

    • addUser

      boolean addUser​(User user, java.lang.String password)
      Adds a registered user to the database
      Parameters:
      user - User to add
      password - Password of the new user
      Returns:
      True if the operation was successful

    • deleteUser

      boolean deleteUser​(User user, java.lang.String password)
      Deletes a user from the database if the password matches
      Parameters:
      user - Username of the user
      password - Potential password of the user
      Returns:
      True if the operation was successful

    • existsUser

      java.lang.Boolean existsUser​(java.lang.String nick)
      Checks if a user (real or virtual) exists in the database
      Parameters:
      nick - Username of the user to look for
      Returns:
      True if the operation was successful

    • getUser

      User getUser​(java.lang.String nick, java.lang.String password)
      Returns a user in the database if the username and password matches
      Parameters:
      nick - Username of the user to search for
      password - potential password of the user
      Returns:
      True if the user exists and matches the password

    • addVirtualUser

      boolean addVirtualUser​(java.lang.String nick)
      Adds a virtual user to the database
      Parameters:
      nick - Username of the user
      Returns:
      True if the operation was successful

    • existsVirtualUser

      java.lang.Boolean existsVirtualUser​(java.lang.String nick)
      Checks if a virtual user exists
      Parameters:
      nick - Username if the user to look for
      Returns:
      True if it exists and no error happened
